data.name: Security Booth: Director's Cut
data.detailed_description:
Based in 1996, you work for a science lab known as Nova Nexus.
You work as a security guard at the front gate of Nova Nexus inside a guard booth.
However, tonight it seems something important is happening inside of Nova Nexus and things are... well... a little strange.


Your job is to make sure that only the right authorized personnel are getting into the facility. To do this, when a car arrives at the gates, it is your job to go and talk with the driver and check their licence plate. Put that plate into the Nova Nexus Security System and make sure that the person is an authorized personnel. Along side with licence plates you will have some other key points to check.
Make sure you're only opening the gates to employee's!


The Director's Cut Edition of Security Booth comes with many new features and changes from the original version.

Randomized Cars
Cars will now be randomized, this means each play-though will be different. However, key events will still happen the same way.

Widescreen Mode
Aspect ratio is unlocked, no more black side bars!

New Endings
Security Booth: Director's Cut has several endings and a change to the first ending.

Nova Nexus Archive Tapes
Unlock tapes that show secrets to the inside of Nova Nexus as well as other.. interesting things.

movies.name: Security Booth: Director's Cut - The Stranger Trailer

content_descriptors.notes:
Mild to moderate use of profanity used in some of the notes in game.
References to violent acts in the gameplay and notes.
Death are never seen but suggested.
